<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://youtu.be/KUgym83jLDE]]> Dear Customers,
The RDR-4000M 3D Weather Radar <[[https://youtu.be/KUgym83jLDE]]> uses the latest advances in airborne hazard and weather technology and radio frequency engineering to provide maximum safety, efficiency and value for C-130 operators.
Adverse weather costs the aerospace industry billions of dollars each year through weather-related delays, cancellations, diversions, disasters, turbulence and severe storm activity. The RDR-4000M’s 3D display provides the most complete, accurate and intuitive view of airborne weather hazards, resulting in improved hazard avoidance and increased safety.
We will be at 2017 C-130 Hercules Operators Conference (HOC) and 2017 C-130 TCG International Technical Program Review. Please visit our booth to learn more about Honeywell’s standard or aftermarket solutions.
